TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit FormTemplate extends System.Object

remarks.para: The FormTemplate class implements properties for getting information about a form template, including its version number, its cache identifier, the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) it was loaded from, and an object positioned at the root of its form definition (.xsf) file. The FormTemplate class also implements a method for opening a file contained within the form template .xsn file.
A FormTemplate object that represents the form template associated with the current form is accessed through the property of the class.

example.para: In the following example, a reference is set to the FormTemplate object for the current form template, then the code displays the values of the , , and properties of the form template.
example.code:
Dim myTemplate As FormTemplate = Me.Template
Dim templateProperties As String = "Version: " & myTemplate.Version & _ vbNewLine & "CacheId: " & myTemplate.CacheId & _ vbNewLine & "Uri: " + myTemplate.Url.ToString() MessageBox.Show(templateProperties)

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property CacheId As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ CacheId { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the form template cache identifier.

remarks.para: The CacheID property is set at run time, and the URL it returns points to the folder where the form template's files are cached. The value returned is from the following location in the file system:
Where foldername is a random name assigned in a user's form cache, and cacheID is the cache ID value.
This member can be accessed only by forms running in the same domain as the currently open form, or by forms that have been granted cross-domain permissions.
This type or member can be accessed only from code running in forms opened in Microsoft InfoPath Filler.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Manifest As XPathNavigator
public: abstract property System::Xml::XPath::XPathNavigator ^ Manifest { System::Xml::XPath::XPathNavigator ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets an XPathNavigator object positioned at the root of the form template's form definition (.xsf) file.
Docs.value: An XPathNavigator object positioned at the root of the form template's form definition (.xsf) file.

remarks.para: The XPathNavigator object returned is read-write, but changes are not saved when the object is closed.
This member can be accessed only by forms running in the same domain as the currently open form, or by forms that have been granted cross-domain permissions.
This type or member can be accessed from code running in forms opened in Microsoft InfoPath Filler or in a Web browser.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IO.Stream OpenFileFromPackage(string filename) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function OpenFileFromPackage (filename As String) As Stream

Docs.param: The name of the file to open.
Docs.summary: Opens a file contained within the form template (.xsn) file.
Docs.returns: The specified file as a object.

remarks.para: This member can be accessed only by forms running in the same domain as the currently open form, or by forms that have been granted cross-domain permissions.
This type or member can be accessed from code running in forms opened in Microsoft InfoPath Filler or in a Web browser.

Docs.exception: An I/O error, such as file not found.
The parameter passed to this method is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
The parameter passed to this method is not valid. For example, it is of the wrong type or format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Uri As Uri
public: abstract property Uri ^ Uri { Uri ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of a form template.
Docs.value: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the form template.

remarks.para: The URI property can take the form of a Uniform Resource Locator (URL) or Uniform Resource Name (URN), depending on the location from which the form was opened.
This member can be accessed only by forms running in the same domain as the currently open form, or by forms that have been granted cross-domain permissions.
This type or member can be accessed from code running in forms opened in Microsoft InfoPath Filler or in a Web browser.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Version As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ Version { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the version of a form template.
Docs.value: The version of the form template.

remarks.para: To get the version of the InfoPath application, use the property instead.
This member can be accessed only by forms running in the same domain as the currently open form, or by forms that have been granted cross-domain permissions.
This type or member can be accessed from code running in forms opened in Microsoft InfoPath Filler or in a Web browser.
